last_episode_to_air.name: Blood Bath
last_episode_to_air.overview: The Weber and von Weber families are thrown into a tizzy when Hazel gets her period, but that's nothing compared with what happens when someone from their past appears on "The Wendy Williams Show."

name: Odd Mom Out
overview: Acclaimed author Jill Kargman plays a version of herself as she navigates the treacherous and elite ecosystem of New York's Upper East Side, and the uber-wealthy mommy clique inhabiting this fantastically outrageous domain.

episodes.name: Wheels Up
episodes.overview: Andy makes partner at his firm but feels overshadowed when he learns his brother has just brokered a staggering sale; Jill feels pressured to get her twins into the right kindergarten; Brooke urges Jill to attend a spinning class charity event.

episodes.name: Vons Have More Fun
episodes.overview: Candace, Brooke and Lex discover they are descended from a Prussian duke named Von Weber, and they want to change their surname. Brooke and Candace take Jill to an exclusive spa to show her the kind of perks that come with being a "Von."

episodes.name: Dying to Get In
episodes.overview: Jill starts stressing over interviews with kindergartens for her twins after she realizes she is the only mom who hasn't heard from any schools yet. Andy tells Jill his mother wants the whole family to attend an interview for a prestigious, invite-only cemetery.

episodes.name: Omakase
episodes.overview: Jill meets a cool mom and thinks she can actually form a friendship with her. She sets up a double date for them and their husbands at a hot Japanese eatery, but the meal leaves a bitter taste when Brooke, Lex and their friends arrive. Meanwhile, Vanessa babysits Jill's children.

episodes.name: Brooklandia
episodes.overview: Jill takes the subway to Brooklyn with Vanessa to attend their friend's backyard bash, where Jill bonds with the unassuming moms.

episodes.name: Midwife Crisis
episodes.overview: Jill receives a frantic call from Brooke, who's going into labor, and Jill must ultimately help her deliver her child. Meanwhile, Andy and Lex take in a technology-free afternoon, resulting in a job offer.

episodes.name: Sip 'n See
episodes.overview: Jill reluctantly throws a party for Brooke to introduce her newborn daughter to everyone. Meanwhile, Candace consumes painkillers and cocktails, sending her on a hazy walk on New York's streets; Andy is overwhelmed by the excessive perks of his new job.

episodes.name: Staffing Up
episodes.overview: Jill becomes overwhelmed with her duties at home, so Brooke convinces her to hire a caretaker. Meanwhile, Jill helps Brooke plan her big benefit party.

episodes.name: The Truth Fairy
episodes.overview: Brooke and her mombot posse launch an investigation into who has been telling hard truths about life to their children. Meanwhile, Jill fibs to Vanessa about attending a pricey charity luncheon, and Andy discovers Lex's shocking secret.

episodes.name: Wheels Down
episodes.overview: Jill faces a decision between attending a birthday bash or a prom-theme gala. Andy reveals a secret about Lex, and Candace discloses information that could destroy the family's seemingly perfect appearance.

episodes.name: The High Road
episodes.overview: Jill dips her toe back into the work world by paying a visit to the fashion magazine where she used to work, but she is not opened back with open arms.

episodes.name: Fasting and Furious
episodes.overview: Jill's parents come to town to celebrate Yom Kippur and to take care of a matter of life and death.

episodes.name: Hamming It Up
episodes.overview: Fed up with being the last people on Earth not to have seen "Hamilton," Jill and Vanessa take part in a desperate quest to get tickets in time for actor Lin-Manuel Miranda's last performance.

episodes.name: Crushed
episodes.overview: At Andy's insistence, Jill reluctantly learns to drive with the help of a cute instructor who isn't as perfect as he appears. As Brooke's flagship store opening approaches, she must decide whether or not to invite Lex.

episodes.name: The O.D.D. Couple
episodes.overview: Miles' behavioral issues cause Jill and Andy to seek advice from a child psychologist, who is eager to shift her focus from Miles to Jill and Andy. Meanwhile, Jill and Vanessa have a friendship crisis over Game of Thrones.

episodes.name: Knock of Shame
episodes.overview: During a historic blizzard, Jill and Andy find the family of their dreams - Meredith and Brad, and their three kids - without even leaving their apartment building. Meredith's as irreverent as Jill, Brad's as unpretentious as Andy, and their kids get along like a house on fire. It's a perfect match. Until it's not...

episodes.name: Hanoi Jill
episodes.overview: A doorman strike turns the Upper East Side into a warzone. During a Valentine's Day dinner at Candace's, Jill joins the picket line and Andy inadvertently becomes a scab, while Lex and Brooke take a big step in their relationship.

episodes.name: 40 Is the New 70
episodes.overview: Jill, Andy, and Vanessa all individually struggle with getting older. Lex and Brooke take Jill and Andy out for an enlightening "Dinner in the Dark."

episodes.name: The Hamptons
episodes.overview: Things go from great to gruesome when Jill, Andy and the kids drive to a party in the Hamptons and get stuck in a traffic jam where Jill has a run-in with Joy Green, author of The Joy Manifesto. Lex gets an enticing offer for Brooke's company.

episodes.name: Ode to Joy
episodes.overview: Brooke and Lex have a vow-renewal ceremony, where Jill struggles to tell Brooke that her idol, Joy Green, is a complete and utter monster. The Season 2 finale.

episodes.name: Frisky Business
episodes.overview: Jill and Andy are shocked by how much Hazel has matured when they visit her at sleepaway camp, while victims of Ernie Krevitt’s Ponzi scheme struggle with their new financial reality.

episodes.name: Candle in the Windbag
episodes.overview: Jill hits her breaking point with Candace living at the apartment and takes surprising action. Vanessa tries to add spark to her long-distance relationship with Graham, and Lex receives life-altering news.

episodes.name: M.F.A. in B.S.
episodes.overview: Jill flounders to make the right impression at her art show. New York Times best-selling author Derek Blasberg pays a visit to Brooke and Devon at Von Weber headquarters, but things do not go as planned. In a full existential crisis, Lex gets advice from a stranger.

episodes.name: Children in the Corn Pudding
episodes.overview: Jill is forced to face her fear of the suburbs as she attends a traditional Thanksgiving meal with Brooke’s sisters. Upon meeting Barrett, a perfectionist homemaker, and Berkley, a paragon of condescension, Jill learns why Brooke is the way she is.

episodes.name: Jury Doody
episodes.overview: Jill is riddled with guilt when Candace makes her dramatic return from sequestration and tells the family the lurid details of the Cruise Ship Murder trial

episodes.name: Star Gazing
episodes.overview: Jill books a photo shoot in Los Angeles and brings Vanessa along; they follow musician Dave Navarro on a crazy adventure; Candace oversteps her boundaries with Hazel; Lex faces his deepest fears in a zero-gravity chamber.

episodes.name: Homo Erectus
episodes.overview: Animal instincts take over during the annual sleep-over at the natural history museum; Brooke has cold feet about Lex going to Mars; Simone reveals her true love; Vanessa surprises herself; Andy realizes he's been chasing the wrong woman all year.

episodes.name: Blood Bath
episodes.overview: The Weber and von Weber families are thrown into a tizzy when Hazel gets her period, but that's nothing compared with what happens when someone from their past appears on "The Wendy Williams Show."
